page.title: 07Sailing Club
page.content:
Sundays are usually for family sailing + pleasure.{ { {Deben Week} is a big annual event which is started by a Yachtsman's Service: All dignitaries;including the local {vicar},take tea at{Ramsholt Quay}+ are then led in procession up the river by the{club bosun},gradually they are joined by other members boats and an escort of the club cadets, to finish at{Waldringfield foreshore}for the service itself.
The week is divided into{3 days}at Waldringfield ,{3 days}at Felixstowe and{1 day}at Woodbridge. Shore events include sandcastling, swimming and rowing.
